name: Crimson Skies (itch) (Moatoob)
description:
This is a game that my niece and nephew are helping to create. I've pretty much given them creative freedom to tell a story with characters and story arches  they've created themselves. I hope if you do leave a comment that you keep in mind that this is just a fun learning activity for the kids.

Thank you and I hope you guys enjoy this work in progress!
